topic.title: How do you create sticky posts and news flows?

1_1L8UURA9tgSn2XcRxtpCRJYCQm5S9ELh2Y.body:
> [nofish](#comment_223_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): To sticky a post currently you have to edit the source code: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroTalk/blob/master/js/TopicList.coffee#L7The newsbot source code is here: https://gist.github.com/HelloZeroNet/006347ed183e7f3721ff

Thanks for the infos!

2_167eTX5f6jJt4HPvfQqf2QuwdTFCnxJCf2.body: The space in the middle is used for the newsfeed, if you are using the new "follow" feature.
